title: Happy Birthday, Mari-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Happy birthday, Mari-chan! Mari-chan, Maru wishes you a wonderful birthday! ….Hmm, which one is better?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Thank you, Hanamaru♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hyah-----!! M-, M-, Mari-chan!? Eh? Why!? It’s not time yet, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You’re throwing Mari’s birthday party today, no? I couldn’t wait so I decided to go here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>You’re way too early zura~! Maru has been practicing, did you hear it….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course, not!  I didn’t hear a~nything. So I can’t wait to hear all of the congratulations~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>You definitely heard it! Aagh! But, it’s Maru’s fault for practicing so late~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Did you practice a lot? I’m so happy~. Hearing congratulations will always make you happy no matter how many times. So, instead of saying it just once on the real thing, let me hear some more of the practice ones♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Uu…. Mari-chan, Happy birthday! Maru wishes you a wonderful birthday!! May your life be filled with fun things!! Also don’t forget to have fun with us too, okay-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, thank you♪ Say it a lot more times~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
